items.sentence: Tom hardly ever speaks French to his mother.
Tom has a couple of interesting suggestions.
Tom has a picture of his family on his desk.
Tom has a small farm just outside of Boston.
Tom has already been told about the problem.
Tom had no idea that he was being too noisy.
Tom had no one to discuss his problems with.
Tom has been helping Mary with her homework.
Tom has been playing his guitar all morning.
Tom has been trying to contact you for days.
Tom has been trying to teach me how to cook.
Tom and Mary insult each other all the time.
Tom and Mary looked at each other nervously.
Tom and Mary must love each other very much.
Tom and Mary need to learn to work together.
Tom and Mary own a vacation home in Florida.
Tom and Mary passionately kissed each other.
I struggled to understand what had happened.
I suggest you give your old computer to Tom.
I think I might be able to be there by 2:30.
